data.actual_result: It says "null" and shows the default avatar (Clyde).
data.expected_result: Like on desktop, it says the creator's name and shows their pfp.
data.short_description: Audit log entries that about an invite being created show the creator's name as "null" if they have left the server.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to create an invite for your server. - Kick them. - Force close and restart Discord. - Open Audit log of the server. - Observe the entry that says about the channel being created.
